name: inTime Labs
overview:
inTime Labs is a startup based in Berkeley, CA focused on reinventing the way people interact with events and calendars.

Our current project, Eventable, is focused on simplifying calendar sharing for organizations and companies. With so many different calendar formats and platforms, sharing a calendar online can be a dizzying mess that will confuse almost anyone. We created Eventable to simplify this process so anyone can easily upload/link their calendars and place a calendar follow button on their website. From there, viewers will be able to easily follow those events in their personal calendars.

Our main focus has always been on simplicity and ease of useâ€”anyone, regardless of technical background, should be able to link their calendars with Eventable and place a follow button on their site. Our goal is to make the process of sharing and subscribing to calendars as easy and simple as possible.

milestones.source_description: Announcing the Alpha Launch of Eventable
